name: Theres Something Wrong With Me Who Relies on Curses to Cultivate Immortality
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: &quotYou who don&#039t belong to this world, and yet dare to step onto the path of cultivation. Targeted by the Heavens, we will cast a curse on you, one unbreakable even by immortals. All changes in your body will be reversed, and you will no longer be able to cultivate.&quot Jiang Chen tries to cultivate, but realises that his spiritual energy flows backwards, and scatters in all directions.
